text: Ice Road Truckers is a Canadian-American documentary-style reality television series that first appeared on television on The History Channel on June 17, 2007 (first season). The show follows the activities of truck drivers which operate on routes that contain frozen lakes and rivers in the remote Arctic territories of Canada and Alaska. == Other websites == *Official website * Category:2017 Canadian television series endings Category:American reality television series Category:Canadian television series Category:English- language television programs
title: Ice Road Truckers
